title: Heavyocity - Evolve Mutations 2: Cinematic Sound Design [KONTAKT
description:
=======[ Info ]======================================================================

Product: Evolve Mutation 2
Vendor: Heavyocity
Format: Kontakt 5.3 (and above)
Website: heavyocity.com/product/evolve-mutations/

EVOLVE MUTATIONS 2 takes audio-visual sound design to the next level, bringing 2 GB of new and original sounds for composers of film and TV scores, game sound designers and music producers seeking unique effects and textures. Split into four useful categories, EVOLVE MUTATIONS 2 delivers powerful and dramatic content in a highly convenient package. Created by working pros in the film TV and games industry, EVOLVE MUTATIONS 2 also contains the debut of the incredible new Trigger FX feature for effortless and inspiring transformations.

=======[ Instruction ]===============================================================

For Kontakt 5.3 (and above)

--- [ METHOD I ] ---

- Open Kontakt 5.3 (and above)
- Go to File tab
- Browse for the torrent folder
- Drag n Drop the NKI files into the Right Panel to use.

--- [ METHOD II ] ---

- Go to Library tab
- Click Add Library
- Browse for the library folder's location
- Click Ok/Yes
- Accept or Yes when asked

=======[ Extra ]=====================================================================

I DO NOT OWN THIS PRODUCT - IF YOU ENJOY IT, PLEASE CONSIDER BUYING TO SUPPORT OWNER!
